Is the narrator herself going to be the giantess?

Or is the growing lady a family member of someone whom the story follows?

Maybe a good friend?

Perhaps a complete stranger?

Or maybe... she's not a human?

The first option will follow a first or second person perspective. All the others can be in any perspective desired.

choices: A science experiment you're involved with.
Someone makes you grow without your knowledge.

choices: Megan, more than meets the eye?!
Minnie the soon to be not-so mini!
111.content:
All right, some choices for you to be as a girl experiencing a seemingly out of control puberty.

Megan - 5'6", slightly pudgy. You're a huge game nerd. Your family also happens to be filthy stinking rich and, everyone knows it. You take the limo to school everyday. However, you're about as far from the 'rich bitch' stereotype as you can get, and have been best friends with the biggest girl in school, the 6'5" DD-cup walking wet dream Sara, since childhood. Shortly after turning 18, however, things start to turn... odd. Your dreams take you to exceedingly realistic worlds that you can touch, taste, and smell... like you've been there before. One of the most recent had you... observing what must have been some of the first humans, and they seemed positively minuscule to you.

It's not long after that you start to experience growth spurts, gradually growing taller, curvier, and toned. And as you grow, the dreams begin to seem like they may not be dreams after all - but fragments of past lives.

Minnie - 4'11", no curves to speak of, but a somewhat toned body. Being 19 and utterly ignored by puberty sucks. You hate looking like a little kid, and you REALLY hate people mistaking you for one. You blew up on a guy who bumped into you in a grocery store once because of that, though you did make amends shortly after. You're known for being kind of scrappy, but only really to defend yourself. While not a tomboy, you do enjoy basketball and some other not really girly things.

You'll soon find to your delight that puberty has finally come to make up for lost time, giving you a great body that boys (or girls. You might be lesbian) will want to ogle. But when it becomes clear that said puberty is unrelenting... well, no one's going to try any short jokes on you, at least...
111.title: Puberty gone wild!

choices: I have another small spurt, and decide to do some shopping.
Follow Megan's story from the second-person perspective instead.
1111.content:
Before time began, there was... the Cube.

What? Seriously? Why the fuck do I have that little narration from Optimus Prime (voiced by Peter Cullen) in my head?

Let's back up here. My name is Megan. I have brown hair and green eyes, and I turned 18 about a week ago. I love, love, LOVE games! My human Death Knight character, Meganite (the Relentless) is currently sitting in the 90's, and I plan to grind her up to level 100 over the coming weeks now that I have the Warlords of Draenor expansion for World of Warcraft. My friend, (who I... admit I have a crush on) Davis, has said he can't get the expansion right away, but that suits me just fine - I've already bought a copy for him that I plan to give him on his birthday coming up in a few weeks' time.

Have I mentioned yet that my family is wealthy? Like, really wealthy? Like, we're as wealthy as the Barnes' wealthy? (probably mostly because the elder sister in the family, Vanessa, squanders a good chunk of it on frivolous crap to flaunt her family's wealth. She gives the rest of us rich girls a bad name...) Well now I have. Sadly, my parents are often away on business, so my staff are like my extended family. My maid, Beverly, has probably taken care of me more than my actual mother. That's kind of sad, and even my mother says so.

And they say that rich people don't have problems...

Anyway, I'd be more looking forward to Davis' birthday, but ever since I turned 16, my dreams have been getting pretty weird. Like that night, I dreamed I was in some place I've never been to in my life. And unlike the typical dream, like somehow coming to school naked or my teeth falling out of my head, I still vividly remember every detail of my dream. I can feel the corset that was squeezing my ribcage like a boa constrictor, (as though I'd ever have reason to wear such an abomination with my excuse of a figure) smell the slight dust in the air, and god I wish I could forget that taste...

Every night since has been like that. Different place I've never been, yet so vivid the history teacher loves me. It could be Azaroth or somewhere in the Koprulu Sector (just... not Char... or Redstone... or New Folsom... I've a thing against hellishly inhospitable planets) or hell even Hyrule, but no. I've got to dream about being seemingly random women in seemingly random time periods.

"Megan, if you're done daydreaming over there, why don't you tell the class what a simile is?" Whoops. That would be my English teacher... and he's less than pleased I'm off in my own little world.

"Similes are words that sound the same as one another, but mean different things." I answer.

"That's correct... if we were talking about homophones. A simile is a figure of speech that directly compares two things. An example would be 'dead as a doornail'. Please pay attention in my class."

And just as he's about to go back to his work, the bell rings. My hero. The class and I get up out of our seats and leave for our lockers. It's the end of the school day!

As I gather my things, a large, buxom shadow falls over me. "Mind if I join you on the trip home? My folks are out on their anniversary and the bus seats suck in the worst way." its owner asks in a mildly sultry voice.

I turn around and look up. A fair bit up. Before me stands easily the hottest and most popular girl in school. This walking wet dream of a girl stands an imposing 6'5" - barefoot. Right now she's got her heels on so she's closing in on 7 feet. Her glorious DD-cup breasts rest tantalizingly behind the fabric of her tank top, begging to be let out. And her face, featuring blue eyes, is framed with long blonde hair. But wait, there's more! For as hot as she looks, she's also got a brain. "If you want, but it'll cost you... That'll be one sleepover, please, Sara!"

Sara (pronounced Sa-ra, not Sar-ah) smiles widely and replies, "Deal. We haven't done a sleepover in ages..."

We've been best friends since we were kids. We tell each other practically everything! Which is why while waiting for Alfred to arrive with the limo, I say, "I had a weird dream last night..."

"Another one? Where were you this time, ancient Egypt?" Sara asks inquisitively.

"Same continent, but not in Egypt. In fact... I-I don't think any countries had been established yet. I think if it were, say, Zerus, I'd be around the first Spawning Pool..."

"So the birthplace of humanity? Did you personally know the Flintstones? If your next dream has you in the future, I'm going to suggest staying away from those old cartoons..."

"Very funny, but now I reveal my trap card. Because this part may just blow your mind. You see, this time I'm pretty sure I wasn't one of the early humans. I believe this because I must have been a hell of a lot bigger than any of them. They were small enough to me that I could easily pick them up in my hand like those Warhammer 40K figurines for crying out loud!"

Sara immediately stops giggling as I told her this. "L-let me guess, this dream was just as vivid as the last ones, right?" she asks.

I'm interrupted by the limo's arrival. The black vehicle pulls up by sidewalk we're standing on before Alfred comes out to open the door. "Good day to you, Miss Sara." he says politely, "Am I correct in the belief that Miss Megan wishes for you to be given a ride home with her?"

Sara nods as I confirm, "That's correct, Alfred. We're rectifying the grave matter that it's been ages since we last had a sleepover."

He nods in understanding and allows us to enter the passenger compartment before closing the door. As he gets the limo on its way back home, I return to my conversation with Sara. "The dream was very vivid, Sara. I don't know if they were the entirety of the early humans or just one tribe or so, but I remember the smell of the fire they had going to cook their kill and the feel of lifting an individual closer to my face so I could see and hear him better. They didn't seem afraid of me, which was a relief..."

"A-and then what happened?" Sara asks nervously, yet almost on the edge of her proverbial seat.

"I woke up in my room with my mother telling me it was time to get ready for school." With the current subject exhausted, I changed it to something less weird. "So, what are you getting Davis for his birthday? I've bought him-"

"The Warlords of Draenor Expansion pack and the next three months' fees on you. You've only told me a million times, girl. Any more and he's bound to overhear. But I'm getting him a couple of those Splatoon Amiibo things he's been wanting. If he's already bought 'em by the time his birthday comes around, I'll bury his sorry ass in the ground. It's kind of ridiculous that they're so hard to find..." she answers with a touch of humor. The three of us know she'd never seriously hurt the guy, but every man knows instinctively that it's in their best interest to not anger the hot girls.

...Speaking of hot... I feel flushed all of the sudden. It quickly passes, but I swear I just grew like an inch. My nipples also feel pushed just a touch further into my brassiere, and I feel a little less pudgy around the middle. I remain silent about this as frankly I'm not sure what to make of it.
1111.title: Megan, more than meets the eye?!

choices: My evening goes smoothly, but I have a dream that night...
I have another spurt that evening!
My parents' reactions to my growth aren't what I expected...
11111.content:
About half an hour later, Alfred pulls the limo up to the family mansion so Sara and I can exit. The absolute gentleman then goes to park the limo in the garage before joining us inside. He's both the chauffeur and the butler here, as it keeps the required number of staff down to a minimum. It's my parents' will, but I wouldn't mind more staff around to fill out the mansion. As it is we've got Beverly and Alfred, and while I love them like family... they're both getting up there in age. They've served us for years, well before I came around, but they'll surely want to retire in a few years.

This mansion isn't particularly big as far as mansions go, but it's been in our family for a few generations. Now if I were to dream being here in the early days, when it was new, THAT would be cool. I'm aware that much of it has been refinished or changed to comply with new building codes, such as the plumbing and electrical, but it'd be interesting to see what it was originally like.

Anyway, the exterior looks like it could belong on a postcard, with vines encroaching up the brickwork and even some of the pillars near the front entrance. It's quite characterful. The interior is pretty typical wealthy family fare: fancy furniture, huge TV, rare and expensive vases, a few trinkets from my parents' trips, that sort of 'wealthier than thou' stuff. It's... okay. Most of the really 'rich people' items in our home are family heirlooms - which generally means crap no one's had the guts to toss or sell. But my favorite thing in the house, aside from the TV for my consoles and my computer for the internet and PC games, is the big picture greeting you when you come in. It's a picture of me and my family, including Beverly and Alfred, and while it's a few years old now, this would be the thing I'd rescue if this place caught fire. Everything else is either unnecessary or can be replaced. This picture represents an irreplaceable memory.

"Welcome home, Miss Megan! And hello to you, Miss Sara!" My maid, Beverly, greets as Sara and I come in, "Alfred, Master Jake has asked for you to meet him in the study when you have a moment."

"Yes, dear. I will be with him in a moment." Alfred acknowledges and takes his leave for the study where my father awaits. I should go see him shortly, though I'm sure Alfred will inform him that I've invited Sara over.

"Miss Megan, shall I show Miss Sara to the guest rooms?"

"No, thank you, I'll do it." I say and guide my friend out of the entrance lobby and upstairs. "The guest rooms haven't changed places since your last stay far too long ago. They have been soundproofed though so guests don't hear me cursing and screaming about some boss and its cheap trick to wipe my party, and I don't hear stuff they'd rather keep private." I say to her with a smile, "Gonna have to ask you to take off the heels though. Mother's gotten the new floors down and will ground me into Tuesday of next year if I let them get scratched up."

"Well as I wouldn't want my best friend to get in trouble with her mom..." Sara replies, and pops her high heels off, wiggling her toes within her socks afterward, "Besides, it's good to get out of them after..." she stops as she notices I'm not quite as short to her as I usually am. "Um, are you standing on your feet weird? I swear you were shorter just a little while ago..."

"No, my feet are flat on the floor. But now that you mention it, I do seem like maybe an inch taller than before... maybe puberty is finally taking notice of me?"

Sara shrugs and takes her bag and shoes to the guest room closest to my room. I of course went into my room to better check what was going on with myself. ...It was a good thing I did go in there, because no sooner did I close the door I get overwhelmed by that flushed feeling from earlier. This time, it's a fair bit stronger! I feel myself slowly stretch taller and taller. The bit of fat around my stomach melting away as it heads north to grant me some actual breasts. It's barely A-cup, but it's a start. My ass feels a tad firmer as well. And my clothes... they feel slightly restrictive.

"...Okay, I've heard of late bloomers having a fast growth before, but this?" I mumble, measuring myself against the door. I'm stunned when I turn around: 5'10". Holy crap. That's four inches in less than an hour! I-I've got to let Sara know about this!

I bolt out of my room and straight into the one Sara's using. "Sara! You... you've got to see this!" I implore urgently.

"What is it? A band of gnolls and murlocs that kind of look like Davis' face? Girl, you've seriously got to-" Sara starts, only to stop as soon as she notices I'm taller than a few moments ago. She glances down at my feet, then back to my face and stammers, "W-what's going on here, Megan? No one grows four inches within a single day!"

"I wish I knew. But on the bright side, I might just make good on that claim that I'd put your body to shame one day..." I answer, laughing nervously.

"You did, didn't you? The day you admitted you've always been jealous of my physical blessings even as a kid, if I remember right..." she recalls, and then smiles as she adds, "So glad you admitted it to me rather than let it eat you up inside, Megan."

To me, that was about the scariest moment in my life, having to confess I secretly felt that way about her figure for so long. I mean, my family has more money than we know what to do with for crying out loud! (which does beg the question why my parents still work if we're practically set for life... The truth is they enjoy their jobs, but not being out of my life so often) But it felt good to get it off my chest and not let it build into resentment.

I gasp in shock as I feel my friend grope my chest from behind, snapping me out of my thoughts as she remarks, "Hm... Feels like you might have to get some real bras soon. My best friend's growing up... I'm so proud!" she lets go to allow me to turn around to face her and adds with revived concern, "Still, how do we explain this to your parents? To Beverly and Alfred? You can't avoid them."

After giving it some thought, I sigh and reply, "I can't explain this to them when I don't even know what the hell is happening other than I'm growing in odd spurts, but I can't avoid anyone seeing me, least of all my family." I gulp and add, "I've no choice. I'll have to show myself and hope they don't act like the sky is falling. And hope this growth doesn't get ridiculous too fast." I change the subject. "Let's get our homework done for now, and we may as well do it together."

"Sure, but let's do it in the study so you don't get distracted by your games, and so this growth doesn't shock everyone at dinner."

Reluctantly, I nod and return to my room to retrieve all the homework I have to complete for tomorrow. Sara had a point on both fronts, as I could at least lessen the ambient shock by dinner in letting my father and Alfred see I've grown now, and I remember only too well the last time I got chewed out for not completing my assignments because I let myself get distracted by my games. Really don't want to repeat that mistake.
11111.title: Homeward spurt.

choices: I wake up in the morning unchanged from last night.
I find I've grown a bit overnight, among other things.
111111.content:
The study is an interesting room. There's an electric fireplace in the corner that's always on whenever someone's in here, especially my father, and a few desks as he wanted to make this room inviting to use for more than one person at a time. The desk my father uses is really old, one of the few original pieces of furniture in the mansion, yet very well loved. As Sara and I enter the room, we find my father and Alfred in the middle of a discussion.

"...But sir, surely you can't be serious!" Alfred exclaims.

"Jillian and I've discussed it between ourselves, and our decision is final. You and Beverly may retire or resign any time you wish, provided we can arrange suitable replacements for you, but you may not leave our family." my father replies in his usual tone that meant the topic isn't up for discussion, "We're ashamed to have to say you've been better parents to our daughter than we have, yet it pleases us that she's been in excellent hands under your care. She sees you like family, and we want you to remain as part of our family."

"Did we... suddenly step on the set of The Young and the Restless or something?" Sara asks with confusion, bringing the men's attention to us.

"Ha ha... no, not quite, Sara. It's a pleasure to have you over in our home again." my father says, greeting my friend with a smile, "Can Alfred get you anything before he takes his leave?"

"Um, no thanks. Megan and I need to tackle this homework. Also... something odd is happening to her." Sara replies.

"Oh? What is it, Megan?" father asks before starting to notice the reduced height difference, "M-my goodness! Perhaps we should get you examined... this can't be natural..." Alfred nods in agreement.

I wanted to agree as well, but something... something deep inside told me this was nothing to worry about. I couldn't find the will to disagree with it, so I answer, "No, I'll be fine... Besides, the doctors would probably just say I'm growing without informing us why that is."

"But will you be all right for your friend Davis' birthday, honey?"

"Oh, I'd have to be on Death's doorstep to miss his birthday. I'll be fine." I reassure, and everyone soon drops it for now. In the meantime, I work on today's homework with Sara. We're able to help each other out with it as while we sadly don't have the classes at the same time, we do have most of the same ones this semester. I get stuck with P.E. while she gets Music.

Eventually, we finish our homework, and get summoned for dinner. I receive stares from mother and Beverly, but they don't really press the issue. Maybe Alfred informed them ahead of time? Whatever. The food smells too good to care about much else at the moment! I help myself to a good plateful of it once Sara has taken what she wants, then dive right in shortly after sitting down at my seat.

After I've cleaned my plate, I consider going back for seconds. Normally I don't because... well, I'm pudgy as it is without adding to it, but with my recent growth I figure I ought to be starved. However, after a moment's hesitation, I... decide against it. I could eat more, but something within whispers to me that it isn't necessary. Oddly, it seems to me as though it's the same something that assured my sudden growth spurt was nothing to be concerned about, and I hadn't the will to object this time either.

Sara and I play some games after dinner like Sorry! and Backgammon. I win some, and she wins some. It doesn't really matter since we're both having fun and chatting about stuff. "One of these days, girl, you are going to have to confess to Davis how you feel about him. I mean it!" my friends says.

"I know, but I'm not ready yet." I reply back reluctantly.

"Well you better start getting ready, Megan, as he's not going to wait for you forever. Jump on that train before it leaves the station!" Sara counters.

Interestingly, I feel a little something reacting to her words, knowing she has a point, but I'm not sure what that something was. However, eventually I start feeling tired and we decide it's time to call it a night. So we pack up the games and return them to my room, go through our nightly routines for bed, and then tuck in the beds in our rooms and go to sleep...

I find myself out in the open, nude, but unconcerned. Of all the creatures to have roamed the Earth, none are mightier than I. None are larger than I. This small group of humans, really just a few tribes, are aware of me. Their communications are... limited, but they've already mastered tool and weapon making, and harnessed the power of fire. (as well as learned the valuable lesson that fire is indiscriminate, and must be respected) However, they're aware that nothing they could ever invent can harm me, and that I could snuff out their meager lives in an instant should I so choose.

But they don't fear me, which I find heartwarming. As much as I could destroy them, I do not wish to and I believe they pick up on this. I allow them to worship me... mostly because they stubbornly refuse not to. It's cute, in a way. As I roam, my footsteps shake the ground, yet not a trace of a titanic human footprint left behind. The humans sometimes ask for my aid, and while I will not give it in war, I help a little to improve their lives in other ways. The idea is not to make them dependent on me, as they have great potential but must reach it on their own, merely assist them.

Finally, I come upon the settlement I've helped the humans establish. It's... crude, but it fulfills its needed task. I bend down and gently pick up a male among the group, my head priest I believe. I am careful not to allow my considerable breasts crush the crude homes these people have worked so hard to create as I bring the man to my face in order to hear him better. "You honor us with presence, great one." is a rough translation of what he's saying. It's not in English, but I understand his grunts and sounds as this is what he's trying to tell me.

"It pleases me to hear it, little one. Your people will soon no longer need my guidance, and while I am aware you are unhappy with this news, your people must learn to stand on their own two feet. I will always be with your kind in spirit to smile upon you." I reply to him.

Just as he's about to protest... I wake up with a start. I glance over at my alarm clock, which reads 2:00 AM. "What the hell was that dream about?! It was like the one from the night before... only extended. Hell, I can still remember what I was thinking in it..." I say to myself quietly. Soon, I begin to suspect... "...Are these even dreams?"

A voice in my head whispers, All will be made clear in time. Rest now, child... It sounds so familiar, yet I find myself too tired to dwell upon it. As sleep overtakes me again, the voice adds, Our changes are just beginning...
111111.title: Dreaming up clues.

choices: I have a bigger spurt in school!
1111112.content:
There's this annoying beeping coming from beside my bed. "...five more minutes... No, better make it ten..." I grumble in protest at my alarm clock, not-so-gently slamming the poor thing's snooze button. It's not that I hate mornings, I just hate getting up from a nice cozy bed. And right now my bed is indeed nice and cozy.

You must awaken, child. A new day awaits.

Oh great. Now the voice in my head wants me up. Once again, I've no will to resist, so I get up and get ready for another day of school. Curious, I measure myself against the door: 5'11". Another inch overnight. I'm pretty sure this means a trip to the mall later is in order... and not to look in Gamestop like I usually would while there. Still, I haven't bought anything fancy to wear for Davis' birthday yet, so maybe this afternoon would be a great opportunity for that? It's one of those occasions where I really do care about what the hell I'm wearing.

I pick out the largest, baggiest clothes I've got that fit the school dress code and proceed to march on into the bathroom. With some struggling, I take off my clothes before I step into the shower. What I find underneath it all impresses me, and I'm... admittedly surprised I never noticed until now. My belly is now almost completely flat without me trying to suck it in. That alone would be nice, but my breasts seem to have grown a bit bigger as well! Turning around, I can see my ass is a bit larger than yesterday. "Well. I actually look my age to some degree! Still have a ways to go before I'm beating Sara, but it's definitely a start." I say as I admire myself, then get on with the shower.

As I bathe, my thoughts wander to the matter of how the fuck I'm going to explain this to everyone at school. Explaining it to Davis is going to be hard enough! Not to mention having to squeeze into gym clothes that are going to be a bit too small... My worries persist even after I finish up and get dressed, following me right down to breakfast. I kind of wish I didn't have to worry about that, especially if supposedly this is just the beginning.

Time seems to pause. It's creepy, seeing a bird outside frozen in the air in mid-flight among other things. You needn't worry what others will think of these changes. that voice in my head says, stronger than I've ever heard it before.

"Okay, who the hell are you and what do you want? Are you going to tell me to kill someone?" I ask aloud, confused and a little annoyed.

We are one, yet divided. I wish to aid you while the division fades, child. the voice answers. We will speak again...

Immediately after it says that, time resumes as if nothing ever happened. I don't completely get what it meant, but who am I to question? Besides, I need to eat something before I have to get going, not dwell upon my looming insanity. Cereal seems like a good choice, so I pour myself a bowl. I might consider having something fancier on the weekend when I have time to enjoy it.

It's not long before Sara joins me, wearing one of the spare outfits we keep around for her in case she comes over. "Hmm, seems someone's grown a little during the night." she comments.

"Yeah, and going to need to do some shopping after school, presuming I don't outright outgrow it. At this point, I don't know." I reply.

We finish our breakfast, and finish getting ready for school. Outside, Alfred is already waiting for us with the limo, talking with my mother. I hope I'm as pretty as her when all is said and done, at the very least. She wishes us both a good day at school as we get in and Alfred drives us on our way.

When we arrive at school, Sara and I soon run into Davis. It's kind of strange to be able to look him in the eye without having to look up. "Er, who are you and what have you done with Megan?" the black-haired boy asks.

"Hey! Just because I've hit a... bit of a growth spurt doesn't mean I'm not me!" I reply, a tad miffed though my heart currently refuses to stay all that mad at him.

"W-well if that's true, then prove it."

"Remember the time my Death Knight beat the ever-living snot out of your dwarf? And that they're both at that inn currently? If you've moved him within the past day, you're cheating."

"Okay. Sorry for doubting you, Megan..." Davis apologizes, blushing heavily. Probably embarrassed about being reminded of that humiliating defeat... unless... Nah, probably not.

Interestingly, as I proceed to my locker and ready for my first class... no one else seems to notice anything off with me. In fact, they all treat me as though I've always looked like this. But surely they'd notice?

I said you needn't worry about what others thought of you... the voice in my head reminds. It - she, I guess, as it does sound feminine - must have done... something to ensure I wouldn't be looked at strangely. As it is I've got my classes to worry about, so I don't give it much more thought. And my first class is History, which is my best subject. I guess that makes me a bit of a nerd in more than just games, but lately I've been feeling as though I've personally been through some of these events and periods...

After History comes... ugh... P.E. class. I probably should get in better shape so I don't suck at it. I get out my gym clothes, and find to my surprise as I go put them on that they're sized to fit me okay. Still just standard issue, but at least I won't look like I'm trying to shove myself into too small clothes. Even my Converse shoes I wear for the class fit nicely, not even the slightest sensation of them pinching my feet! "Well let's get this over with." I say to myself.

"You're late, Megan." the teacher tells me as I come in, "Give me three laps around the gym."

What an asshole. I know I'm a minute or two late, but does he have to make me run three laps around the gym? Everyone else gets like one lap if they're late! I go to take the laps he wants me to do. Half a lap in I'm starting to feel tired... then that familiar warmth. I watch as my limbs get just slightly longer, and feel all fat on my abdomen vanish. My clothes feel a tad tighter, but when the warmth fades, I feel... energetic. Not tired in the slightest. So I just keep going around and around the gym...

Soon I hear the teacher's Fox 40 blow in my general direction. "All right, Megan, that's enough! I asked for three laps not seven!" he yells. Wait - seven laps? I honestly wasn't really counting!

The rest of the class continues to a similar effect since that spurt. Whereas before I would have performed abysmally in the activities the class and I are being asked to do, now I perform them with no problem. Hell, I'm the only one to climb the rope all the way to the top, a feat I've never achieved before! Davis comes close, and actually manages to get almost to the top with my cheering him on before his muscles give out and he slips off the rope to the mat below.

At last, the lunch bell rings and we're allowed to go change and head for lunch. "Hey Megan? How tall are you now? Like 6 feet or something?" Davis asks as I come back out of the change room.

"I guess? I think my body's changing in ways I don't understand, here. I never do like seven laps around the gym. I normally can barely even manage one! And I still feel like I could keep going!" I answer, even if it may not necessarily be what he's looking for.
1111112.title: Tiny growth, bigger changes.

choices: I have something that's decidedly not a dream that night!
I grow even more before the night!
11111121.content:
As I head for the cafeteria, I notice I'm receiving a few stares from people. If they didn't notice I had grown to 5'11" since yesterday, I very much doubt they notice the extra inch I've grown just today that puts me at 6 feet tall, so they must be looking at me for some other reason. It's a lot more attention than I'm used to, as being easily the richest girl in school only carries one so far when they're physically unimpressive in any regard. Yesterday, I fit that description easily.

But today, while I'm not yet on my BFF Sara's level, there's probably not a fat cell to be found in my body where I don't want it. A few minutes in, I feel myself stretch another inch taller, my clothes just a bit more snug than before. Surprisingly, I gain another inch before the feeling subsides, making me 6'2" tall. "How long was I underwater?" I ask curiously.

"Nearly half an hour, Megan." Sara replies with slight worry.

"Huh. I guess I'm beyond breathing now, as I didn't feel the slightest bit of discomfort down there..." I reason. I don't know everything about my body in what it can do and what I don't need to worry about anymore, but with any luck I will soon.

...come to think of it, I haven't had to use the toilet at all in days. Considering how big I am now and how big I'm surely going to get before all this is said and done, that's definitely a good thing.

Eventually, I decide to experiment a little. Hey, if using these powers helps break down that barrier, that division between the parts of my self, then why not try out a few things? First, I get out of the pool, restoring its original dimensions afterward. Next, I remove all the tattered remains of the clothes I've outgrown from Davis' place so he won't have to later. And then... I make myself grow.

"...Again, Megan?" Sara asks with minor annoyance as my clothes again shift to something I don't mind ruining as much.

"Well why not?" I respond, concentrating on making this outfit grow with me... to an extent. The fabric stretches uncomfortably as I ascend, more so because I'm not letting it just fail utterly this time. Tears form at the seams, small at first but slowly expanding, not unlike myself right now. Eventually, they're almost on the brink of tearing off completely when I stop growing, shifting back to the cyan bikini for now. I'd say I'm about... 30 feet tall at this point. Yeah, sounds about right.

Finally, and without warning, I teleport myself, Davis, and Sara (and her car) to my place. It's a surprising amount of exertion to perform this feat, way more than I thought it would take. Then again, I'm instantly relocating a couple tons of car and myself and two of my closest friends, (including one my heart strongly desires to become much closer than just friends) so... yeah. A lot of stuff. And over a pretty great distance, too.

"W-what the hell? How the fuck did we get here?" Davis asks incredulously, "And what about my house? My parents will flip if they discover it unlocked and I'm not there!"

"Teleport successful!" I answer, unable to help myself, "Er, don't worry about your house, dude. It's locked up as tightly as can be." Davis breathes a sigh of relief, knowing he's not about to get in trouble with his folks. "Your clothes are inside in the guest rooms if either of you want to change... or leave."

Thankfully, they decide to stay for now. However, Sara and Davis do go inside for some lunch at an unfazed Alfred's offering. In fact, he seemed like he's expecting this. Maybe my family somehow already knows what's going on now...

Just then, I felt another spurt incoming. Once again, my bikini is exchanged for another old outfit that's quickly being outgrown. Thinking quickly, I take a few lengthening steps away from my home so I don't potentially damage it, then focus on letting this spurt flourish as much as it wants to. And of course, the Master Sword earrings grow with me, which soon are about as large as some actual swords tend to be. We've a few sets of armor holding blunt swords in a few places, something I've always admired a little.

My outfit soon rips and tears, then falls off my swelling form piece by piece. It's not long before I'm once again left naked, yet I'm only barely bothered by it now. I notice that while my muscles don't seem to be growing any more defined, the rest of my body most certainly is improving. My hips and ass widen out bit by bit with every foot of height I gain while my breasts swell forth a little at a time. My hair even extends down my back, soft as silk yet putting spider silk to shame in terms of strength. (and spider's silk is pretty damn strong, pound for pound)

What really intrigues me as this growth finally begins to peter out is my veins: they're alight with an almost eerie green glow. I soon realize even my eyes are glowing in this green color! The glow continues even after my growth stops and I regain the outfit I had on this morning, standing a massive 100 feet tall. My boobs are definitely bigger than Sara's now, proportionately speaking, suited for something like F-cup. "W-wow... I've done it... I've totally beaten Sara..." I remark to myself, "But why am I glowing like Narud after he's revealed himself?"

It's a sign. We are close... so close now. I strongly encourage our friends and family to remain here. With any luck, they will witness the greatest event in human history: the rebirth of the largest, mightiest being to ever walk the Earth. my other self answers me.

I also notice my shoes have changed, now being Converse instead of Nike... not that it matters much considering Nike owns Converse, but...
111111211221.title: Playing with power.

choices: I give my friends the full story.
1111112112211.content:
A little later in the afternoon, Sara and Davis are... more than a little shocked that I had grown so huge since they went inside for lunch. Oh, and that I was glowing like a gigantic firefly. That part is probably the most unsettling thing, even for me. "Um... hi guys? I'm totally not an evil shape-shifter, I swear!" I greet as they stare up at my massive form. This feels almost familiar now... though the scale is still off. Soon though, everything shall be right.

Wow. I sounded so full of confidence just then.

"You know... I think I preferred you when you weren't green with... whatever this is, Megan." Davis says, and I feel a sharp disturbance at that remark both in my heart and body. "But other than that, you, uh, look lovely!"

"Pro tip: don't hurt the feelings of a girl who could squash you like a bug, Davis." Sara reprimands, smacking Davis in the back of the head.

"Ow! I never meant it like that... Jeez..." Davis whimpers, rubbing the back of his head, "Besides, even if she is practically a 100 foot tall glow stick at the moment, my feelings for her haven't changed! She's still our best friend. You hear me up there, Megan? I'm not leaving you."

That remark seems to quash the disturbance, though I can't help but wonder why it popped up in the first place... Anyway, I nod and reply, "I may be huge, but I can hear you just fine! Say, would you guys mind staying over here for a bit? If you don't want to, I understand."

Without hesitation, Davis smiles and answers, "I'd be glad to. Actually, I've been meaning to come over and spend some time with my friend, so it works out."

Aw, how sweet of him! Really, I think I only truly need Davis here with me, but the more the merrier. And I'd like for both of my best friends, as well as my family, to be here for the event of a lifetime. I turn my attention to Sara as she replies, "You know I can't resist an invitation to stay with my BFF!"

For most of the afternoon, the three of us try to enjoy ourselves. Granted, my sheer size makes this difficult, but I still try to have some fun with my friends. I soon have a fun idea, and conjure up a giant chessboard complete with chess pieces, minus the black queen and king's side knight which Sara and Davis take the place of respectively. For this, we play by a modified set of rules: if I take out both of them, then the game is over. I'm not playing myself. However, if either of them gets taken out and a pawn of theirs makes it to the end of the board, it can be used to bring them back. (albeit still as their respective piece)

Of course, I have to move most of their pieces, given they can't move to push a piece without it counting as the one they're representing moving, (just like in the Harry Potter movie, which I adore both the movies and the books) but I play fair and only move their pieces to where they say. Now, just because they're my friends doesn't mean I go easy on them. Like, as I take the knight Davis represents, I bump him pretty roughly with my queen, though not enough to hurt. Both Sara and I get a good chuckle as he goes to relax in a seat by the captured black pieces. The game goes on, with Sara and I losing pieces here and there. Eventually, the game comes to its end, with Sara staring up into my eyes in front of me as she boldly declares, "Checkmate!"

I scan the board to confirm, and indeed I'm beaten. I tip my king over, saying, "Well played, guys! I think dinner should be nearly ready."

My friends head inside and get cleaned up for dinner while I make the chess game vanish. As night falls, I wish my friends and family a good night before curling up in the backyard and falling asleep.

I wake up early the next day, surprising myself with how well I slept outside without any comforts or shelter. What's more surprising is that I don't feel cold at all. I yawn and stretch, accidentally sending my fist into a dead tree my family's been meaning to have cleared. The thing shifts in the ground from the blow, yet my knuckles are unscathed from punching its still solid trunk. Out of curiosity, I stand and pull up on trunk, yanking it out of the ground almost effortlessly, then set it down on its side. Despite being just athletically toned, I'm clearly way stronger than I look!

As the morning marches on and my friends and family have something for breakfast, I notice the glow my body's putting out through my veins beginning to brighten. I respond by taking my shoes off and having my socks vanish, then call those closest to me for the coming event. "I need you guys out here right now, if you're not too busy..." I say.

My friends and family quickly heed my call, coming outside just as I feel a load of power course through me. I feel and hear my bones shift and crack as they slowly enlarge and come to bear more weight. My clothes once again slowly tighten around me, the sleeve cuffs of my shirt constricting around my upper arms very uncomfortably. My pants start to ride up my legs a few feet at time, which isn't that much considering I was 100 feet tall before this started, while up top they start hugging my hips more than they're supposed to. Thinking quickly, I move my growing hands to the button and undo it before it potentially flies off and hits something I'd rather it not.

"I can't take my eyes off her..." Davis mutters as he stares transfixed upon my growing frame. I moan as my muscles feel as if on fire with the raw power flowing through them, though everything stays proportionate. That doesn't mean my undergarments are spared, however, as my body slowly outgrows them too, constraining me even as my outer wear is already doing a fine job of that itself for the moment. To further bombard me with sensations, I can also feel the soles of my feet slide across the grass as the very foundation of my body extends in all directions while I climb higher into the sky.

Finally, my clothes begin tearing at the seams as my head starts to creep up towards the tip of a pine tree we often decorate for Christmas. My pant legs rip at the cuffs from being unable to pass my knee caps, exposing ever more flesh with increasingly brighter glowing veins. I can feel the air itself beginning to crackle across my skin from the raw power building within me, especially as more of it becomes exposed to the open air. In a rather dramatic finish, both my shirt and pants give up in quick succession, tears forming across the seams and paths of least resistance before either falling off or hanging off me uselessly, leaving me for the moment in just my far too tight undergarments.

It soon becomes unbearable to keep the bra on, and so my still expanding hands reach behind my lengthening back to unclasp the thing. I fiddle with it, but the clasp breaks before I can get it undone and I just take the useless thing right off. I look down my growing, topless body, now decidedly taller than that pine tree, I sigh, then reach down to my panties and brace myself as I give a sharp tug. A loud snap fills the air as the garment breaks, seemingly almost thankful to be put out of its misery, and I now stand as naked as the day I arrived on this planet.

Internally, I can feel the last remnants of the barrier crumbling away as my growth picks up its pace somewhat. My feet begin to encroach upon the safety of those below me, so I step back to give them more room, the yard extending to allow me to do so. As I continue to grow taller than the trees nearby, including the pine I've been so fond of and am currently using as a reference, I feel... an incredible joy as the two halves of my being merge. By the time my considerable breasts hover above the pine more and more, the memories of my past lives become fully unlocked, right down to their final, peaceful moments before passing away.

Speaking of final moments, my growth begins to slow as my crotch passes the top of the pine. I come to learn all that my other half kept from my knowledge until now, including the reason why this started in the first place... and why it was briefly threatened yesterday with Davis' remark. The people below appear all the smaller as I continue to finish my growing ascent and reclaim my former glory, what I once was in ages past and long forgotten.

At last, after my previous size is barely above knee height to me, my growth ends. I cease the glow from my veins as I stand complete, reborn. "THE MERGING... IS COMPLETE! NOW, WE ARE ONE!" I exclaim, both audibly and through my friends and family's minds, my words positively dripping with untold power the likes of which the world hasn't seen in a long, long time. (not that it remembers) At the astounding height of 360 feet tall, I've never felt more... alive than I do right now. I suppose several millennia of dormancy will do that...

I notice the now too small Master Sword earrings, still hanging off my ears. I correct this, focusing my will into making them fit me as well as they did when I had bought them on Friday.
1111112112211.title: The goddess reborn!

choices: I just focus on maintaining my own size.
I mess with Sara a little.
11111121122111.content:
Gazing down towards Sara and Davis, I quickly become aware of their terrified expressions. Perhaps... perhaps the telepathic exclamation was a little much, though I could hardly contain my enthusiasm... I'm also not oblivious to the mess I created when I outgrew my clothes, including the pair of panties still in my hand that I snapped to prevent another embarrassing situation, which would've been made worse by being in front of my family. Not to mention I've yet to have any of the time I thought I was going to have to do my homework...

No, "I was too busy reawakening my true self" isn't an acceptable excuse to not having it done. Not in the slightest. That would get me detention and a zero at least as large as I am right now faster than an upgraded zergling on creep. (that's pretty fast)

So the first order of business for me is to at least have some cover. I don't mind being naked, but human culture these days insists upon being clothed, and I wish to respect this. That, and I believe I've given Davis enough of a show for at least a week. I focus upon my destroyed bra and panties, utilizing the powers I possess to twist metal and fabric back to its proper shape, then to expand the amount of material within them to gradually fit me once more. Finally, I put them back on, obviously.

Bringing my attention to my ruined outfit, I will my shirt and pants to reconstitute themselves. The fabric knits itself back together gradually, reforming the simple yet stylish shirt first then the hip-hugging pants I had been drawn to on Friday, though both are still much too small to fit. I decide to reduce them to a more manageable size, and then trade for the dress I meant to wear for Davis' birthday, which both he and Sara should still remember from the adventure in my mind a couple nights ago. Obviously, I use my powers to make the dress fit, along with the socks I removed just prior to my most recent growth. I'd rather not think about how much material currently goes into each shoe after expanding them to once again fit...

"Much better." I remark to myself, voice still carrying the air of the raw power at my disposal. At last, I kneel down before my friends and say with a smile, "Seriously. Did you two truly believe I could resist quoting an archon? Or Arthas? You guys know me better than that!"

I see them both hesitate before Sara finally steps forward to reply, "D-do we really know you? I'm not so sure anymore, and I don't know how you can prove it legitimately..."

Her remark stings, but she does have a point. "Well... you guys deserve the truth about me. We've been friends for years, but I couldn't tell you any of this before because I didn't know until now." I say, and continue after a quiet gulp to collect my thoughts, "What you see before you here is the true me: the largest, mightiest being the world has ever known."

"O-okay, so you're a giantess. Kind of obvious, Megan." Davis interrupts.

"Actually... I'm an ancient goddess. I don't even know how old I actually am, but I was around in the time of the early humans. No, the dinosaurs were long gone by the time I arrived." I correct him, "A few tribes worshiped me while I granted them aid on occasion when they asked for it, though not in war."

"So what happened?" Sara asks, intrigued.

"I helped them eventually establish a settlement, but... I was kind of an idiot and went into dormancy, being reincarnated as a new female among humanity to quietly observe them. O-on the plus side, this lets me ace History class easily with the sheer experiences I've been through in my past lives... Still, I was wise enough to establish a trigger for my return... Anyone care to guess what it was?"

Sara mulls it over before her blue eyes widen as she says, "...you giant sap! If you fell hard for someone, then you'd regain your true self so you weren't hiding anything from them!" I concentrate, and have a small trophy appear before my friend with WINNER on the plaque. "So then, there's one thing left. Don't even think about making excuses, Megan, it's time you tell the one responsible for this happening how you feel about him!" Davis starts to walk away when Sara grabs his arm. "Get back here, you doofus. You're gonna hear our friend out if I have to sit on you to do it!"

I take a deep breath to calm myself before I admit my feelings... but it gets muddled as Davis says something at the same time. I try again, and we end up trying to talk over one another again. On the third try, I will his mouth to stay shut. "Just listen, as this is important. I've... I've had a crush on you for years, Davis. My love for you has allowed me to reawaken my true self. I-I know this is a lot to take in, and if you'd rather someone a bit more... normal be your girlfriend... I understand..."

After giving it a minute to sink in, I let Davis speak again, wanting to hear what he had to say. "Megan... I'd never think about having anyone else but the one my heart belongs to, but to think she wants me as her boyfriend... right now I must be the luckiest guy in the world! If this is a dream, I sure as hell don't want to wake up!" he confesses.

I feel so overjoyed that Davis and I share the same feelings for one another! I try a little experiment, and with a great deal of not easily secured concentration, compress down to a more manageable 6'4" height. I squeeze my now boyfriend in an affectionate embrace, being sure I don't accidentally hurt him as I happily say, "Oh thank you, Davis! You can't begin to imagine how happy this makes me feel!" I unintentionally make the sun shine brighter like I just used Sunny Day due to my mood, but I at least make sure it doesn't bother anyone while I'm on cloud nine.

"Thank GOD you two lovebirds have finally confessed to each other!" Sara exclaims, "I've had to be both of your confidants, trying to prod both of you to just spill it out to each other when the only ones oblivious to the doey eyes you had for each other were yourselves. I'd have threatened to lock you two in a room together if I didn't think you'd just sit there playing Angry Birds on your phones or something..."

"We totally would, wouldn't we?"

"I'd bet money on it." The two of us laugh before I turn my attention over to Sara and say, "I'm sorry we both ended up asking you to keep this to yourself, Sara. As our friend, I'm sure it wasn't easy for you..." I pause and ask hesitantly, which sounds a bit ironic considering my voice still carries my immense power behind it even at this diminutive size, "Er, we... we're still friends, right?" Sara nods, and I give her a friendly hug as well that unintentionally squeezes the air out of her lungs.

A few moments later, I return to my full default size without tearing my dress apart, much to my relief, and return the sun's intensity to normal. Overall, a marked success. I'm able to compress myself down to a more human size, choosing 6'4" since as fun as an amazonian 8'4" might be... I'd rather not have to alter everything just to accommodate me in school. I might opt for much smaller at some point, if only just for a little while, but perhaps slowly playing around with the sizes between 6'4" and 360 feet would be a fun experience? Especially with Davis to watch...

Currently, I think I may focus the few days on practicing holding my chosen human size for hours at a time first before I go messing around with various sizes. This is something I've never done before in my long, long existence, much of which spent in dormancy, so I need some time getting the hang of it... that or being prepared to apologize for every time I accidentally outgrow the school. (I might have to do both) It will certainly give me an excuse to play my beloved games, or catch a movie with Davis on my treat.

Although... I could probably make others grow if I want. While I don't have to worry about the square-cube law, (oh god the look on scientists' faces upon discovering the skeleton of my original body would be priceless!) I should probably take it relatively slow with a human so their body can get used to being big if I do that. Perhaps my best friend Sara Mars would like a taste of being big?
11111121122111.title: A goddess' tale.

choices: My plans hit an unexpected hiccup...
111111211221112.content:
A loud grumble soon echoes across the neighborhood. It doesn't take being a goddess to recognize the sound is coming from... my stomach. "Well someone's hungry..." Davis remarks to me, lightly jabbing the side of my shoe with his elbow. He certainly seems much more energetic around me now that we've actually confessed our feelings to each other. It still boggles my mind that we had both entrusted this secret with Sara, which was probably the worst kept secret in the history of life, the universe, and everything! (the answer of which is 42)

"Ha ha, my stomach doesn't care that I'm an ancient goddess reborn in modern times... it wants food yesterday!" I admit sheepishly. Originally, I rarely needed much of anything, which was fortunate considering a 360 foot being can... pack a lot away. Now, while I'm sure I can't starve to death, I haven't had anything to eat since breakfast yesterday and I'm used to eating regularly. This would also be a great time to properly fill my family in on all of this instead of constantly altering their perceptions.

First things first, though, I use my power to bind my Master Sword earrings to my being, so they'll now change size with me effortlessly. They're comparatively small enough that I can get away with it, and I won't need to constantly take them off. Once done, I compress myself down once again to my chosen human size of 6'4" almost instantly and head inside my home for the first time in over a day, then make a beeline for the kitchen to find something to have for lunch.

"Miss Megan? What are you doing? What is going on here?" I hear Beverly ask from somewhere behind me, clearly sounding very confused.

"I'm just getting some lunch, Beverly. You... still remember me being giant, right? And my voice in your head and ears earlier?" I answer and question back, making no effort to hide the power within my voice as I prepare myself a large sandwich.

"W-well yes, I-I do... B-but what is this all about? I'm a-afraid I don't understand..." she frightfully replies, tearing into my heart a little with her fear.

"You and the rest of my family don't understand, my young, sweet Beverly, because I've restored your perceptions of me. You're able to notice my changes just as my friends can."

"What? Y-young? But I'm nearly 62 years old!" Beverly exclaims in her confusion, following me into the dining room next door.

I set my meal down on the table and explain, "I'm an ancient goddess reborn into modern times. I can call protoss young. No, I'm not possessed, this is me. You needn't be scared, I'd never hurt my family and I'm positive my parents have told you how much you and Alfred mean to us. Me especially." I pause as I take a bite out of the sandwich I made and continue after swallowing, "Now then, the giant size you saw earlier is my normal size, but I'm currently compressing myself into the size you see before you. I'm letting you and the rest of my family know now because I love you, and am deeply sorry for not letting you know of this right from the start."

It's not long before Sara and Davis come inside and confirm my story when asked. As further, undeniable proof, I will a space in the corner cleared and summon Fat Chocobo... complete with the morbidly obese bird's theme from the Final Fantasy games. I'd... rather not think about how it stores all of the party's currently unwanted equipment, if I'm honest. Especially while I'm eating, as I want to keep my stomach contents where they are.

When I'm finished, and have made Fat Chocobo vanish, I consider going back outside when I remember I've still yet to do my homework for the weekend. Well I did want to practice holding a smaller size for hours at a time... "Have either of you guys done your homework yet, or are all three of us in the same boat of not even started?" I ask my friends. When both shake their heads no, I teleport their books and such here and suggest, "Then how about we do that now and not give the teachers a reason to bite our heads off? I'll meet you guys in father's study once I get my books."

Sara and Davis nod and head out into the hall with me. Our paths split as I take a detour to my room, remembering to remove my shoes before stepping foot on the floor upstairs my mother recently put down and teleporting them to the tray in the entrance lobby, rejoining them after I grab my homework.

Inside the study, I find my father dumbstruck as I take a seat next to Davis and get started on my homework. I did project my conversation with Beverly into the rest of my family's minds, but I guess his little girl actually being a goddess is a lot to take in. I simply smile at him warmly and continue with my current task, which surprisingly isn't any easier than before. I suppose the memories of my practically countless past lives can only help so much...

After the three of us finish our various homework assignments, I decide to begin a little experiment with Sara. She admitted she was a bit jealous of me yesterday, and since my curves were merely comparable to hers then, I can only assume the (now second) hottest girl in our school was jealous of my height. I intend to give her a taste of what it's like to be a giantess, but I can't instantly do that as I won't risk her life on something her body isn't physically adapted to handle. Instead, I'll have her gradually get there, like a diver taking breaks as they return to the surface to avoid 'the bends'.

Besides, this is more fun!

Using my powers, I subtly tweak my blonde friend's pituitary gland to occasionally douse her bloodstream with a flood of growth hormones. In addition, I ensure this experiment won't physically affect Sara negatively as it goes on, and re-purpose that mental link I had left in her mind a couple nights ago into a basic monitor of her mental state. I trigger my experiment to start and wait for a reaction.

I don't have long to wait as I watch her face become just a little flushed. "Are you okay?" I ask, also practicing hiding the reverberation of power in my voice as much as I can. It should be sufficient for anyone not listening closely, but I won't know for sure until school tomorrow.

"I-I'm fine, Megan. Probably just coming down with something. I guess I'll just have to down a few cartons of orange juice to nuke whatever it is with vitamin C." Sara replies. My monitor tells me that's what she honestly believes. She has no idea what she's in for, but she will soon. Her pituitary is a ticking time bomb and she doesn't even know it.

Later that evening, after a dinner in which I had to very carefully assure my family once again that I'd never hurt any of them, and in brighter news officially announce Davis and I are now boyfriend and girlfriend, Davis enters my room and asks, "So, uh... how are you holding up? Is it particularly hard to maintain this size over your I guess normal huge one?"

I look over from the story I'm reading called Mind Over Matter to my boyfriend and answer with a smile, "It's not that hard, but it feels weird. I feel a bit vulnerable like this, which isn't something I'm used to. Still, it's worth it for love and games!"

Davis smiles at that last remark, and asks as he takes a seat next to me, "You've done something to Sara, haven't you? If she was truly falling ill with so much as the sniffles, I think you'd offer to cure her even if she does tend to be a bit stubborn."

Busted. "Well let's just say Sara's got big things in store. Please don't tell her anything about this, I don't want her to demand to be changed back so soon."

"My lips are sealed, Megan." Davis responds before we embrace and he leaves.

Shortly after, my mental monitor alerts me to the fact Sara is about to experience a growth spurt, the first of many over the coming days. Using my powers, I watch as her already long legs slowly extend and thicken, her bones and muscles increasing in mass, her feet slowly expanding even through her knee high socks the cuffs of which creep lower slightly faster than she's actually growing. She always did like to dress just teetering on the edge of the dress code, which now works against her as her hips and ass start forcing her short skirt to expose more of her panties, which are stretching unhappily for the moment even as they start cutting into her hips slightly.

That also holds true for her tank top, which stretches yet reveals more of her flat midriff than it should, as well as more cleavage than usual. As it doesn't cover them at all, her slowly lengthening arms and widening shoulders are spared the sensation of being constricted by its fabric. The same can't be said about her bra being forced to contain a slowly increasing pair of breasts on a slowly increasingly larger chest, its straps starting to dig into her collarbone and back. I also watch as Sara's face grows along with the rest of her, though her look of bewilderment hinders its beauty.

And just as quickly as it started, her spurt ends, her pituitary out of juice for the time being. However, her growth was proportionate in all regards, from her cute button nose to her impressive DD-cup breasts to her long, sexy legs... to her internal organs. That peanut sized gland is now just a little bigger to go along with her now 6'8" body, which means her next spurts could be increasingly bigger. Thankfully, I've already ensured her body won't eat itself due to her growth. And as for her clothes... while I may occasionally help, she'd best be ready to wear stuff she won't mind outgrowing and ripping out of.
111111211221112.title: Adjustments

choices: I help Sara like I did for myself.
We're soon not alone in the halls...
1111112112211121.content:
For a couple of moments, Sara appears calm. Internally, however, her mind is a flurry of chaotic activity, trying to figure out what just happened and why everything feels a bit off. I've no doubts that my blue-eyed blonde friend will eventually realize she's growing. Granted, it seems to me she's not about to catch on until at least another spurt, which even I don't know when will happen, but when she does... the realization I'm behind it probably won't be far off. Still, I know she won't try to kill me for two simple reasons:

She's not the kind of person capable of taking a human life, and;

Even if she was, she'd know I'm the only being around that can reverse her growth.

Regardless, I proceed with my nightly routine, and then plop my pajama-clad butt down in front of my computer to read more of this Mind Over Matter story series. In some ways, I can sort of see myself in Sophie and Aria, two of the characters in the story. I wish I could go in there and help them, but I also don't want to ruin the story the writers are trying to tell. I settle for materializing the two before me and giving each girl a heartfelt hug before she can say or do anything, then sending them back to their story none the wiser. I kind of like the former's brown hair with that silver streak in it much more than the practically pitch black hair. Oh well.

Soon enough, I turn my computer off and go to sleep... sort of. (I'm not questioning how she got a barely fitting set of clothes, the glowing eyes tell me all I really need to know)

Her tank top is faring little better as her enlarging breasts consume more and more space within it, competing with her widening shoulders and abdomen. Sara moans... a little more loudly than she really needed to as the fabric eventually gives way right down the middle, freeing her DD-cup boobs from their confinement, and with a playful shrug leaving her once again nude. In response to this, she crosses her ever-lengthening legs in front of her to keep that area out of view, but doesn't seem to do... anything about her breasts. Odd...

11111121122111212111.content:
Once more, I try to get into Sara's head. And once more, I hit the mental equivalent of a brick wall in my attempt. For years, I've known my best friend to be strong-willed, and even a bit stubborn on some matters. They're but a couple of traits I admire in the blonde beauty I've been friends with since kindergarten. But this is taking things to a whole different, almost ridiculous level! "Come on, Sara... please... let me fix this for you." I plead, desperate to undo what my actions had unintentionally unleashed.

"You can't fix this, Megan, but that's all right." Sara replies simply, the reverberation of power still evident in her voice, "I want this. And I want to do what I have planned, though I'll keep you and Davis here in the dark about what my plans entail... for now."

My practically 15 foot friend smiles, glowing blue eyes and all, but all I can do is shudder with worry. Sara is clearly toying with us. Does she want revenge on me for abandoning the early humans who worshiped me so long ago? Didn't she see, via my memories, how it pained me to make that decision? If she remembers, I even said yesterday that I had messed up! I had intended to return every now and again to check on them, but in my error, I was unable to do so.

"Megan, how about we do our homework for now?" Davis suggests, "We may as well try to keep busy while we wait for Sara to be ready to reveal her master plan..."

I was about to argue that we should be trying once again to find some way out of here when I recognized the futility of doing so. The very definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over and expecting a different result, after all. Plus, stopping Sara wouldn't be any easier outside than in here, so it makes sense to simply wait and see. "Yeah, I guess... and perhaps a game or two after that." I respond, nodding reluctantly.

My boyfriend and I climb over Sara's huge legs, which is easier said than done with them crossed in front of her, to get to our backpacks that contain our homework for the day. The giant blonde tucks her legs to her body, almost like an upright fetal position, before we turn to head back and get started on it, which at least makes things easier. The wall between the living room and kitchen reappears, and I hear the washing machine kicking in on its own in the laundry room...

We work away at our homework soon afterward, occasionally glancing at Sara to see what she's up to. Every time we do, she smiles and waves at me or Davis. We finish our assignments for the day by the time I hear the washing machine finish and the dryer start, so we kill some time by trying out this game called the Special Land of the Dragon: Shattering Future, based on a story of the same name. In some ways, it reminds me of our current predicament, though Sara's definitely not a cyborg... as far as I can tell, anyway.

Nearly an hour later, Sara announces, "Now, my friends, witness the next step in my plans! This is going to be big!" and with that, she raises her hands to the ceiling over her head and braces herself as she begins to grow. Davis and I watch as she crouches down more and more, letting her enormous, expanding breasts hang freely from her chest, her golden blonde hair cascading down along either side of her face and past her widening shoulders, while her creamy, ever-broader back begins to press into the ceiling. Her unrelenting figure brings drywall and wood crashing down around her, yet it completely avoids Davis and I without me having to will it to. The sound of splintering wood plays with the sound of Sara's bones cracking as they gain ever more mass like a duet most would rather not be hearing... yet we've front row seats to it.

"This is your plan?!" Davis asks in disbelief, "Outgrowing your own home?!"

Sara giggles as her head breaches the attic, the river of gold slipping up into the hole in the ceiling she just created as she continues to rise, and replies, "Only the most obvious part of it, Davis. Haven't you ever watched Attack of the 50 ft Woman before? This is a classic element!" She thrashes the rest of the ceiling with her lengthening arms, clearing more room for herself as she begins to stand in earnest. I can see her feet sliding across the debris-covered carpet without care as to what they run into in their expansion, as well as her long, smooth legs stretching longer and higher with each passing second.

Whatever is left of the living room ceiling fades out of existence, allowing me and Davis the ability to see Sara's entire giant, naked body pressing against the roof of her home. Her huge kneecaps advance towards us as she bends her knees, her growth not relenting in the slightest, bracing for the moment of freedom. Above, her big blue eyes' glow illuminates the darkness, showing her swelling head is indeed right up into the peak of the roof... If her transformation was anything like my awakening, then she's very clearly playing this up for dramatics, waiting for the right moment to break free.

That moment soon comes. With one almighty heave, Sara straightens her legs and breaks the roof apart as though it were made of paper mache, her body soon widening the hole she made as she ascends further into the deep red of the evening sky. Her curvy hips and ass break past the roof line before, at last, her growth concludes. However, she brings her arms together and hammers the rest of the roof around her apart. "Huh. I was kind of hoping that 25'5" would be enough to simply step out of this house..." the golden blonde giantess remarks before shrugging shoulders the width of a basketball player's height, "Oh well. This is still awesome!"

With the house in ruins, I shout, "What possible reason could you have to wreck your home like this? You're not freaking Wreck-It Ralph! You are no friend of mine!"

This caught her attention. "Oh Megan..." she starts, "I think I've played this charade long enough. It is time for the final act!"

Before I can react, Sara dives her huge hands into the remains of her family's living room, picking me up like a doll. The glow of her eyes seems to turn ominous, and even her hair blowing in the wind, the light playing with it like a cat playing with a string, does little to ease my... well, uneasiness. Still, her body is just as magnificent as ever, the proportions entirely unchanged, just many times larger. "So let me guess. Now you destroy me, claim my power as your own, and then conquer the world. All for your revenge. Before you do the deed, I want to know why wait until now to do this, and why involve Davis?"

"Hmm. Nice guess." Sara answers, "Too bad it's so totally and utterly incorrect." and before I could ask, she shoves me between her massive boobs and hugs me like a child hugs a teddy bear, catching me entirely off guard. From what I can glimpse of her face, she's... smiling? With my powers, I can sense that my boyfriend is feeling the same thing I am at the moment in the giantess' embrace, just shy of having the life squeezed out.

The dryer buzzer goes off, and Sara finally relents on her hug. "And now... my plans are... complete! Thank you, and goodnight!" she announces, setting me down onto what remains of the roof with the same level of care one would an egg and then taking a bow.

Okay, now I'm confused. All of this... was an act? I can feel Sara's barriers on all the exits dispersing, which from the huge hole she created, I witness Davis taking advantage of to get out with both our things. I start to focus on her clothes when I feel her suppress it. "I can handle this, Megan." she says. Indeed, I watch as her bra and panties appear, gaining enough material to properly fit before finally covering her body. Her outfit from this morning follows suit, at last rendering her fully clothed, though as usual, said clothes leave little of her curves to the imagination. Finally, I see her rise about a foot taller as her favorite set of heels adorn her feet.

I teleport down to where my boyfriend is standing outside just before Sara wades through her house to get out. I will the building to repair itself just enough that it still stands for now. "So... what's the truth, Sara?" Davis asks curiously, "Are you even Sara? Is your sister... like this, too?"

The giant blonde takes a few steps towards us and kneels. "Audrey's as normal as an aspiring florist can be. And while in a way I'm far older than her, I'm still calling her my older sister." Sara responds, "I'm Sara Mars, and I'm a demigoddess. I was born to the early humans that had worshiped Megan until she left them. They felt lost without her, and some even felt she had callously abandoned them. Eventually, the head priest believed he found a ritual of sorts that could channel their goddess into a willing vessel."

"And you were to be that vessel?"

"I volunteered, believing it to be worth my life to call her back. However, we couldn't have known that Megan's soul already resided within another girl somewhere. So I ended up becoming a demigoddess, a being almost as powerful, but... they were disappointed that I wasn't what they had hoped for."

So Sara had mostly told me the truth, then. "I'm so sorry..." I apologize.

"It's okay. I mean, I would've never met my best friend if this never happened, I gained some new experiences including an old one thanks to all that's happened, and... I did get you back for messing with my body." Sara replies, sticking her tongue out teasingly on the latter point, "Come now. You didn't really think I would buy the same story you gave Yasmin, did you?"
